src_original: na śāśvatataḥ,  nocchedataḥ,  na saṃkrāntitaḥ,  parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ,  tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /

na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,  nāpyaniruddheṣu /  api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,  tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
